alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:50PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln, Logan, southeastern McPherson, northwestern Custer, southwestern Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1049 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Halsey to 11 miles northeast of Ringgold to 7 miles west of Tryon. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Tryon, Arnold, Gandy, Ringgold, North Platte Airport, Logan, Milldale, Shanklin Bluff, Tarboz Lake, Pleasant Hill, Hoagland, Brown Lake, Finchville and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 190 and 269. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 36. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 173 and 184. Highway 83 between mile markers 78 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Thomas
